title: I-35E Dallas construction at SH 121

pageHeader.title: I-35 at SH 121, Construction of New Direct Connection Ramps
pageHeader.lastUpdated: July 19, 2016; June 4, 2017 (add photos); January 30, 2018 (update for project completion)

text: A 1.4 billion improvement project on I-35E north was completed in 2017. The project included the addition of four direct connection ramps at SH 121, the Sam Rayburn Tollway.

images.caption: Three restaurants were displaced on the northeast corner of I-35E and SH 121. This view looking northeast along the northbound I-35E frontage road shows the Abuelo's Mexican restaurant and Frankie's sports bar. All three restaurants were cleared in 2015.
A closer view of Abuelo's, "Mexican Food Embassy".
Frankies sports bar was the next restaurant going north.
North of Frankie's there was a section of parking lot before Mimi's Cafe.
Notification on the entrance of Mimi's.
Footing for the connection ramp from southbound/westbound SH 121 to northbound I-35E.
Footings for the connection ramp from southbound/westbound SH 121 to northbound I-35E, with an overhead sign for I-35E visibile in the background.
This September 5, 2015, view looks south toward the interchange. The restaurants were cleared, but the sign for Frankie's was still in place.
This view shows the substantial progress on the ramp closer to SH 121, with piers and beams in position.
This March 2016 view looking northwest shows the pier for the new ramp from southbound I-35E to eastbound SH 121.
Another view of the new pier

This view looks west along SH 121. In foreground is a form for a pier for the SH 121 eastbound to I-35E northbound ramp. Further back in the distance are piers for the ramp fro I-35E northbound to SH 121 westbound.
This view looks west along SH 121 on the southwest side of the interchange, showing progress on the ramp from SH 121 eastbound to I-35E northbound.
Piers on the northwest side of the interchange.
Looking south, from the northside of the interchange. The pier is for the eastbound SH 121 to northbound IH-35E ramp.
The northbound IH-35E frontage road is in the foreground.
Looking southwest
These are ramps to northbound IH-35E.
Near the center of the interchange, a form was in place for a pier.
The ramps were nearing completion in this April 2017 photo.
On the U-turn from southbound IH 35E to northbound IH 35E
Looking northbound along IH 35E
Looking northbound along IH 35E
Looking along the IH 35E southbound frontage road, underneath the connection ramp
On the east side of the interchange
This view looking northbound along IH 35 shows the new collector-distributor lanes, which had just opened when this photo was taken in April 2017.
Another view of the IH 35 collector-distributor lanes.
